roleset.name: hinder, try to stop
roleset.note: IMPEDE-V NOTES: I'm going to get in trouble for this example, I just know it. Onlyuse "instrument" when it is clearly separate from the agent. (from impede.01-v)
IMPEDIMENT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on impede-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls forbid-67. (from impediment.01-n)

roles.note: arg3-instrument omitted. Use MNR if it comes up. Arg2-secondary predication not expected to occur in nominalizations, so also omitted. If you see an instance that requires both arg1 and arg2, send it in. (from impediment.01-n)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: The number of ROC diplomatic partners is far behind that of the PRC , which seriously impedes Taiwan 's efforts to take part in international organizations .
example.arg: Taiwan 's efforts to take part in international organizations

example.name: ARG2 and ARG3
example.text: However, the law's narrowness has impeded it from serving as a tool to strengthen ecosystem resilience generally.
example.arg: from serving as a tool to strengthen ecosystem resilience generally.

example.name: both args
example.text: When the dams were built upon the Snake River, their impediment of the flow of the river made for deeper water, and calmer currents.
example.arg: of the flow of the river
